name: Sandeep Gupta
title: AI/ML Engineer
about: Final year B.Tech Computer Science student with hands-on experience in AI/ML, passionate about building intelligent applications and solving real-world problems using data-driven solutions.

responsibilities: Undergoing training in Neural Network techniques and data filtering as part of an AI development internship

Collaborated with a team to present findings, visualize insights, and suggest improvements for future iterations.
